member.name: M:CustomerApi.Controllers.CustomerController.Post(CustomerApi.Events.Commands.CreateCustomer.Command)
member.summary: Action to create new customer in the database
member.param: Model to create a new customer
member.response: Returned if the customer was created
Returned if the model couldn't parsed or the customer couldn't be saved or the validation failed

member.name: M:CustomerApi.Controllers.CustomerController.Put(CustomerApi.Events.Commands.UpdateCustomer.Command)
member.summary: Action to update an existing customer
member.param: Model to update an existing customer
member.response: Returned if the customer was updated
Returned if the model couldn't be parsed or the customer couldn't be found or the validation failed
